title: [Self-Directed] Design of Digital-Based Educational Programs for Improving Adolescent Mental Health

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychology and understanding of adolescent developmental stages
context.additional_context: Participants are scheduled to operate youth mental health campaigns or programs in their local communities post-training.

learning_goals: Design a mental health education program for adolescents using the ADDIE model.
Propose at least three strategies for improving adolescent mental health using digital tools (apps/websites)
Develop criteria for evaluating the visual design, usability, and content delivery methods of mental health promotion programs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
